item.title: Infrastructure & Cloud Solutions
item.description: Build infrastructure that supports your operations without constant manual intervention. We design and implement cloud architectures, automate deployments, and create systems that scale with your needs. Experience includes Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, AWS deployments, infrastructure automation with Terraform and Ansible, and hybrid cloud environments. Whether migrating to the cloud or optimizing existing infrastructure, we deliver working systems. CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure-as-Code, configuration management, and automated testing reduce manual work while increasing reliability.

item.title: Small Business IT
item.description: Stop fighting with technology and focus on running your business. We provide comprehensive IT management: day-to-day support, proactive maintenance, web design, security, and strategic planning. From managing your servers and network to building your website and handling user support, we cover the full spectrum of small business IT needs. Month-to-month agreements, responsive support, and practical solutions. Right-sized enterprise expertise for small business budgets.

item.title: Systems Integration
item.description: Integrating complex systems requires both technical expertise and project management. We handle the coordination and technical work to make disparate systems work together. Background includes integrating Live, Virtual, and Constructive simulation technologies for Navy training environments, managing integrated project teams across networks and software development, and bridging multiple Navy test ranges. From planning through implementation, we deliver integrated solutions that function reliably in production environments.

item.title: CMMC Compliance
item.description: Defense contractors face mandatory CMMC certification. We provide end-to-end support from initial assessment through successful certification. Recent successful Level 1 attestation with IonDesign included scope assessment, gap analysis, POA&M development, and implementation. Experience also includes enterprise-wide NIST 800-171 implementation as ISO/ISSO. Whether Level 1 self-attestation or Level 2 preparation, we guide organizations through compliance requirements efficiently.

item.title: Physical Security Systems
item.description: Protect your facilities with properly designed and installed electronic security systems. We handle the complete lifecycle from initial design through installation and ongoing support. Services include electronic access control systems, security camera installations, alarm systems, and integration with existing infrastructure. We ensure systems work reliably and meet your security requirements. Whether new installations or upgrades to existing systems, we deliver security solutions that actually work.

item.title: DevOps & Automation
item.description: Manual processes don’t scale and create opportunities for errors. We build automation that increases reliability while reducing manual work. Experience includes reducing critical data distribution time from 7 days to 6.5 hours through parallelization, implementing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub Actions, and deploying Infrastructure-as-Code across multiple environments. Automated testing, configuration management, centralized logging, and monitoring systems improve operations without adding headcount.

item.title: Custom Electronics & Systems
item.description: Not every problem has an off-the-shelf solution. We design and build custom electronic systems for specialized applications. Capabilities include drive-thru car counters, custom embedded systems, industrial controls, and integration of specialized equipment. Background includes embedded systems for military rotary-wing aviation and hypervisor-based mission networking. From concept through deployment, we deliver hardware solutions tailored to your specific requirements.
